name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Global Business

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Gl: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Global Business The Certificate of Undergraduate Study (CUGS) in Global Business will provide students with a broader understanding of the impact of a global economic environment on business functions. Students will have a thorough understanding of the interdependencies between the functional/skill area of business when working in a global market. This CUGS is open to matriculated College of Business students only. Students must be in good academic standing and have at least junior standing to declare the CUGS.

notes: Required Courses: 12 s.h. Choose four courses from the following list.

Total Credits Required for the Program: 12 s.h. Important Note: Students may only double count two courses from another single major, minor, or other certificate of an undergraduate program they are concurrently completing to fulfill the requirements for a Certificate of Undergraduate Study. This CUGS is open to College of Business majors only.  To declare the CUGS, business majors should contact their assigned advisor.
